channel.title: brew on 不折腾不舒服
channel.description: Recent content in brew on 不折腾不舒服

item.title: brew install httpd 发生错误
item.description: 今天安装subversion的过程中把httpd卸掉了， 结果重新安装的时候发生错误了 tian-mac:~ tian$ brew install httpd ==> Downloading http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/httpd-2.2.22.tar.bz2 Already downloaded: /Library/Caches/Homebrew/httpd-2.2.22.tar.bz2 ==> ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/Cellar/httpd/2.2.22 --mandir=/usr/local/Cellar/httpd/2.2.22/share/man --enable-layout=GNU --enable-mods-shared=all --with-ssl=/usr --wit checking whether to enable mod_substitute... shared (all) checking whether to enable mod_charset_lite... no checking whether to enable mod_deflate... checking dependencies checking for zlib location... not found checking whether to enable mod_deflate... configure: error: mod_deflate has been requested but can not be built due to prerequisite failures READ THIS: https://github.com/mxcl/homebrew/wiki/troubleshooting These open issues may also help: https://github.
